# Program to test comprehension of a given text

# Define a function to test comprehension
def test_comprehension(text):
  # Ask the user to enter a sentence from the text
  sentence = input("Please enter a sentence from the text: ")
  
  # Check if the sentence entered is in the text
  if sentence in text:
    print("You have correctly identified a sentence from the text.")
  else:
    print("The sentence you have entered is not from the text.")

# Get the text to be tested
text = input("Please enter the text to be tested: ")

# Call the function to test comprehension
test_comprehension(text)
